sentences.en: And then you'll give him a nip, like I do.'
sentences.cn: 然后,你就像我这样捏他一下. ”

sentences.en: Don't nip any stalks off the plant.
Don't nip any stalks off till the plant's through blooming.
sentences.cn: 在植物盛开之前不要掐掉它的梗.

sentences.en: I must nip round to the shop for some milk.
sentences.cn: 我得赶快到商店转一圈买点儿牛奶.

sentences.en: I'll nip on ahead and open the door.
I'll nip out and buy a newspaper.
If I don't nip it in the bud, he'll keep doing it.
sentences.cn: 如果我不防患于未然, 他会继续干这种事的.

sentences.en: It is important to recognize jealousy and to nip it in the bud before it gets out of hand.
sentences.cn: 重要的是要甄辨出嫉妒情绪并尽早消除这种心理，以免其一发不可收拾。

sentences.en: Nip the evil in the bud.
sentences.cn: 坏事应当在一开始就加以根除.

sentences.en: She asked her mother to nip the dress in at the waist.
sentences.cn: 她让母亲把那连衣裙的腰部收窄一点.

sentences.en: She gently nipped the lobe of his ear.
Should I nip out and get some groceries?
sentences.cn: 要我赶紧出去一趟买些食品吗？

sentences.en: The dog gave me a nasty nip on the leg.
sentences.cn: 那狗在我腿上狠咬了一口.

sentences.en: The presidential contest is nip and tuck.
There is a cold nip in the air.
Try to nip this kind of bad behaviour in the bud.
sentences.cn: 要尽早制止这种不良行为。
